channel.title: Friends Search Food on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends Search Food on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: dive
item.description: Today i went to this great dive of a bar for lunch. It reminded me of all the great bar food i have had throughout my life… I ran into a great problem today at the library… a hundred year old little man has stolen the book i need to start my research, it is funny… he is at the library from 8-3 and i need it from 10-3 hehe so that fucker will soon be tricked….
